column1: Little Goat Diner////Awesome design and really cool feel.  We had great service
column3: and the prices are quite reasonable for the quality of food.  My wife had this special which was a bunch of fresh arugula and other goodies with eggs on top of naan bread
column4: while I had the crispy chicken french toast concoction
column5: both of which blew our collective minds.  Plus we were basically full until we had a very
column6: very late lunch (It was almost dunch.  Or is it linner?).
